q2: Brazil is better than Atletico Madrid.
a2: Of couse and that the real madrid also
a3: Brazil has played in every World Cup, the first being in 1930
q4: Brazil can not be better than Atlético de Madrid, because athletics is a club and Brazil is a national team.
q5: Samba soccer is synonymous with the Brazilian national team. There is no comparison with Atlético de Madrid.
a5: I believe its unfair to compare a national team to a club team. Brazil national team are the best from a number of top clubs
